ResearchProjectDef.label: Frontier Uniforms
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover the means of protecting your infantry for all forms of weather, whether it is heat or cold.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Officer Uniforms
ResearchProjectDef.description: Officers need to have more than one uniform, because if one gets dirty it will ruin his image of respect in the unit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Support Kit
ResearchProjectDef.description: The expanding conflicts require more and more specialized and support roles entering the field, Doctors and Engineers are now needed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Infantry Kit
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Infantry need more than what they can hold in their pockets, time to get them some belts, webbing, and bandoleers to really help the wars.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Carapace Armor and Helmets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Older Flak Armors have become quickly outdated in the massive conflicts in the Rim, time for an upgrade to match the times.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Specialized Flak Armor and Helmets
ResearchProjectDef.description: With some grease paint, you can make the armor match the person that it is assigned to, whether that's an engineer or medic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stormtrooper Kit
ResearchProjectDef.description: Reinforced and modified armor seen on many attrition worlds, for the cruelist fighters.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Thermal Helmets
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Polar Cold of the planet is a quick killer, which is why these helmets are wrapped to keep their wearer warm.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy Carapace Armor and Helmets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Infantry in the field have come up with a means of making their armor thicker and more durable, with some spare plasteel plates and a welding torch.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Officer Carapace Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: The War Department has approved the field construction of Officer-grade reinforced armor, high quality armor at a fair price.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vanguard Carapace Armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Equipment commonly seen in the hands of Scout and Vanguard divisions, light and durable though lacking protection.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Polar Uniforms
ResearchProjectDef.description: Harsher weathers require more specialized uniforms that can handle the environment, this one is for avoiding freezing to death in the middle of a glacier.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Surplus Infantry Weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: The latest batch of outdated and obsolete equipment have reached the Rimworlds. Equipment made before the Mechanoid and Insectoid Wars when humanity still loved fighting itself over petty squabbles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Surplus Experimental Weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: The former cutting edge technology from advanced rail guns to primitive charge based weapons. This is surplus that still packs a punch and still drives a hard bargain from many.
